item.title: Narnia Writeup
item.description: Intro So, I’ve decided to try doing the Narnia wargame, and document my attempts. Let’s get started! BUT FIRST - SPOILER WARNING! Do not read this writeup if you plan to solve Narnia yourself! Narnia0 –> Narnia1 First, we log in: ssh -p 2226 narnia0@narnia.labs.overthewire.org With the password narnia0. We know that the data for the levels is in /narnia, so: ls -la /narnia Let’s read narnia0.c! From a quick glimpse, we can deduce that the program reads 24 bytes from stdin into a 20 byte buffer.
